body.name: 21 Inch Round Fire Pit Cover for Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0, 600D Heavy Duty Waterproof Firepit Accessories for Outdoor Camping, All-Weather Resistant (Black, 21"Dia x 15"H)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 17 mins
features: ✅ 【 Special Size for 19" - 21" Stoves 】 Cover size is 21" Diameter x 15" Height. Compatible with 19.5" Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0 and other similar round fire pits up to 21 inch in diameter
✅【 Heavy Duty 】 WICKTICK Round Fire Pit Covers are made of High-Class 600D Oxford fabric, heavy-weight and tear resistant, far better than ordinary 420D/210D covers

✅【 Waterproof 】 Lined with top-class PVC layer, WICKTICK fire pit / stove covers prevent rainwater from seeping into inside, which protects your bonfire stove from outside elements throughout all seasons
✅【 Windproof 】 The Drawstring at the hem could make the stove cover stay in place firmly, avoiding being blown away by winds
✅【 Further Protection 】 Dual-Stichings prevent the cover effectively from cracking at the stitches; Thermoplastic sealing stitchings inside prevents rainwater from permeating though the stitch holes
✅【 Easy to Use 】 The Solid Handle on the top make it easy to place and take off the cover, very convenient and effortlessly
✅【 Adaptability 】 Suitable for outdoor 17 / 18 / 19 / 19.5 / 20 / 21 inch Round Firepit Stoves, providing full protection at all seasons of the year
🎁【 Package 】 1 x Cover and 1 x Storage Bag (NOT include any fire pits)
❤️【 3-Year Warranty 】 Once Free Replacement under warranty due to any quality problem
❤️Please buy WICKTICK high-quality fire pit covers with confidence! A great cover could protect your outdoor furniture all the year round

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WICKTICK Wateproof Covers for 17-28 Inch Round Fire Pits
Cover Sizes available for Solo Stove

Previous page Front side of Material Heavy-Duty 600D Oxford Fabric Stitched in a double-needle process, firm and resistant to cracking Back side of Material Waterproof PVC layer on the inner layer of fabric 100% Waterproof Performance Completely blocks rainwater infiltration Back side of Material Seams at the top are sealed with Waterproof Tape Completely prevent rainwater from penetrating into the interior through the needle holes Handle on the Top Strong & Durable Handle Easy to put on & take off Drawstring at the hem Easy to tighten and make the cover fit more snugly, wind-proof Next page 1 Top-class Material 2 Waterproof Layer 3 Waterproof Stitching 4 Solid Handle 5 Drawstring

Live Video - About Waterproof Performance Completely blocking the rainwater outside the stoveTake it off with one hand easilyRecommend using with lid or cooking grate like the one in the video *Real-shot video from an Amazon customer named Nem. Thanks for him showing how waterproof the cover is on rainy days.
Tips: Please DO NOT use this cover while your fire stove is still hot. Please put the cover on after your stove has cooled down.

Is it compatible with Solo Stove firepits? Yes. The 21"x15" cover is compatible with Solo Stove Bonfire series, and the 28"x18" cover is compatible with Solo Stove Yukon series. Of course, all they fit other round fire pits as long as the size matches. Do all of WICKTICK's products enjoy a 3-Year Service? Yes. Once you order WICKTICK's products, you will automatically enjoy this policy. In 3 years, if the product you ordered is damaged due to quality reasons, you can tell us via Amazon's Order Details and we will do our best to solve problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cover fits nicely over the fire pit and has velcro straps for the bottom legs so the winds don't have the opportunity to lift it off as a result of high winds. Have had a lot of rains and all was kept dry. Well worth consideration for quality, ease of use and cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cover seems very sturdy. Cover is oversized by one inch which makes it very easy to put on fire pit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, quality material
reviews.reviewText: This fire pit cover exceeded my expectations. It fits perfect & the material is pretty heavy duty/good quality. I also like the bottom buckles that you can clip around the legs to secure it. The storage bag is a nice touch. I assume it will hold up well this winter. The rain we had pilled/beaded on top, so it seems very waterproof. Time will tell, but so far I’m extremely pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: My fire pit looks beautiful and fits to a tee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good replacement cover
reviews.reviewText: Cover was a little larger than I needed. The heavy fabric is waterproof and hopefully very durable. Time will tell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a larger cover at the HD, I found this one on Amazon. It fits perfect, we have strong winds and lots of rain the cover is thick and has velcro leg hooks to hold it on. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Good and Does Its Job
reviews.reviewText: I had a fire bowl that came with a cover, but it leaked, so I bought this as a replacement. I've had it on the entire summer with no leaks and no issues. It can hold standing water on top and never leak a drop. That was the biggest key for me. Aside from that, it's thick and durable. It looks good and goes on and off easily. It was an excellent value for the money, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Way better then the one that came with the heater....
